snippet: Torture, watch lists and increased surveillance are among the ways that the government has infringed on human rights and the rule of law since 9/11, says an official of the A.C.L.U. Readers are invited to respond.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations

lead_paragraph: Torture, watch lists and increased surveillance are among the ways that the government has infringed on human rights and the rule of law since 9/11, says an official of the A.C.L.U. Readers are invited to respond.

headline.main: Invitation to a Dialogue: Human Rights Since 9/11
headline.print_headline: Invitation to a Dialogue: Human Rights Since 9/11
